name: John Doe
title: Fullstack Developer
description: I'm an experienced full-stack developer with expertise in both frontend and backend areas. Using technologies like .NET and React, I build robust and scalable solutions that prioritize user experience. I'm very passionate about my work and always strive to deliver high-quality results.

name: Jane Embedded
title: Senior Embedded Systems Specialist
description: I specialize in creating programs for dedicated devices. With expertise in C, C++, and Assembly, I craft firmware for everything from smartphones to medical equipment. My designs are always optimized for performance and provide robust security.

name: Jun Doe
title: Junior Developer
description: Hello! I recently graduated with a degree in Computer Science and am eager to start my career. I have a strong foundation in web development, with experience in Python and Django. I'm also passionate about data analysis and lately have been exploring C++ through a personal game project.
